english.segment1: Open your heart, love. There was a time. When your dreams were not so small. Even in the dark of night. You know the sun will rise. After all
english.segment2: Don't run away. Don't be afraid. Love can make you new, today
english.segment3: Open your eyes, now. It doesn't matter. How many times you fall. Leave the past behind. I am on your side. Through it all
english.segment4: Don't run away. Don't be afraid. Oh oh love can make you new, today
english.segment5: Yesterday is gone, gone, gone, oh oh oh..
english.segment6: It's not too late. To find your way home
english.segment8: Don't run away. Don't be afraid. Oh oh love can make you new
english.segment9: Don't run away. Don't be afraid. Oh oh love can make you new. Oh oh love, love love. Oh oh love can make you new, today
